from math import *
def C(n,k): return factorial(n)/factorial(k)/factorial(n-k)
x = random.randrange(1,3,1) y = random.randrange(1,2,1) z = random.randrange(5,9,1) rz = z - 1
ans1 = C(4*(z-2),y)*C(12,x)*C(40-4*(z-2),5-y-x) ans2 = C(4*(z-2),y)*C(52-4*(z-2),5-y) ans3 = C(12,x)*C(40-4*(z-2),5-y-x)*1.0/C(52-4*(z-2),5-y)

p.b: Find the probability that a poker hand of 5 cards from a standard deck will contain exactly $x face cards (i.e. J,Q,K) (event `A`), given that it contains exactly $y cards smaller than $z (i.e. 2,...,$rz)(event `B`)"?
